title: Waitress
body:
Hello sweetie
<<if !visited("Waitress.TakeApples")>>
    Did you come to me for my world famous apple pie?
    -> Actually I'm here to give you this letter <<if $post && !visited("Waitress.Post")>>
        [[Waitress.Post]]
    -> Yeah, I'd really like a pie
        Of course you do!
        but... it's kinda awrkward.
        I don't have any apples for my pie.
        [[Waitress.AppleLocation]]
    -> Not really, robots don't eat.
        You can't say that without having tried my pie!
        You surely have some smell sensors, right?
        I'm sure you'd want some pie if I had some right here!
        Sadly I don't because I'm all out of apples
        [[Waitress.AppleLocation]]
<<else>>
    -> Can you tell me when the pie is done?
        That'll be in about 5 minutes,
        You'll have to wait just a bit.
    -> I have a letter for you.<<if $post && !visited("Waitress.Post")>>
        [[Waitress.Post]]
<<endif>>

title: Waitress.AppleLocation
body:
<<if $apple>>
    I see you found some apples
    does giving them to me so I can make a apple pie sound like a good plan?
    -> Yes, go ahead.
        [[Waitress.TakeApples]]
    -> Nah, I'd rather have them for myself.
        I told you you can have the pie afterwards,
        but sure,
        go ahead,
        hurt my feeling,
        your own potential
        and the apples possibility to become something greater
<<else>>
    I'll make you a pie as soon as you bring me some apples, okay?
    Theres a apple tree at the east side of the island.
    You should be able to get apples from it by straight up punching it.
<<endif>>

title: Waitress.Post
body:
Oh, thanks!
It's a set of recipies.
I can't wait to try them out.

title: Waitress.TakeApples
body:
Thanks!!
I'm going to get going then.
The pie should be done in about 5 minutes.
